name: Black Unicorn Horn
description:
Have you ever wanted to transform into a majestic unicorn? Well now you can with a sparkly, spirally unicorn horn! 

This handcrafted accessory is a costume by itself, or can be paired with a tutu and face paint to complete the look. You will love how comfortable this horn is to wear; just pull the elastic behind your head and commence prancing! You may never want to take it off. 

Each horn is covered in glitter, then glazed with a shiny non-toxic varnish. Although hard to capture in the photo, it is beautifully iridescent and sparkles in the light. The unicorn horn is held securely in place with a black elastic cord, which comes large enough for adults, and can be tightened for children. Matching decorative ribbons can be tied behind the head, kept dangling, or removed entirely.

This lovely horn is available in 3 sizes, each weighing less than 2 ounces. 

3 inch ($15): Ideal for kids, or adults who prefer a smaller horn. I have had 3 inch horns in my preschool dress up box, and the kids LOVE them! 

5 inch ($18): Perfect for active wear, including dancing, parties, and prancing. The 5 inch horn is my most popular size option.

7 inch ($24): Great for photo shoots or a more dramatic costume look. The 7 inch horn is also ideal for horses, and can be attached to a bridle using the elastic and ribbons. 



All my unicorn horns are handmade with great attention to detail, then glittered and glazed to perfection. Each is unique, and may vary slightly from the one pictured.

name: Unicorn Horn for Horses
description:
Transform your horse into a beautiful unicorn! Unicorn make for wonderful, whimsical photo shoots, and magical birthday parties. 

Each horn is covered in glitter, then glazed with a shiny non-toxic varnish. Although hard to capture in the photo, they are beautifully iridescent and sparkle in the light. 

Unlike my other unicorn horns, the "horse horns" come with two strands of 30 inch elastic, which is enough to put one around the head, and one around the bridle. The decorative ribbons can then be wrapped around the bridle, or left to flow with the horses mane. 

Horse horns can be ordered in two sizes, either 5 or 7 inches in height. Both options weigh less than 2 ounces. They are very easy to wear, even for long periods of time. Your horse will probably not even notice it!


Horse Horns are available in every color! You can indicate you selection at checkout. 
Colors include:
-White (most popular)
-Black
-Silver
-Gold
-Hot Pink
-Fuchsia
-Red
-Orange
-Yellow
-Lime Green
-Emerald Green
-Sky Blue
-Electric Blue
- Dark Purple
-Lavender

All my unicorn horns are hand-made with great attention to detail, then glittered and glazed to perfection. Each horn is unique!




LONG LIVE THE UNICORNS!

name: Unicorn Horn Party Pack
description:
Having a unicorn party? What better way to celebrate than with a unicorn horn for each guest! These unicorn horns will be a hit, kids LOVE them, and parents love to photograph them. 

Each durable horn measures approximately 3.5 inches in height and weighs less than 1.5 ounces. They are held securely in place with a black elastic cord, and the matching ribbons can be tied, left dangling, or removed. These unicorn horns are "preschooler approved", because they are super light and easy to wear. Plus, each horn comes in it's own organza drawstring bag, perfect for goody bags and gift giving.

All my unicorn horns are handmade with great attention to detail, then glittered and glazed to perfection. They are all unique, and may vary ever so slightly from the ones pictured. 

You may choose the colors of the horns in the party pack. If you indicate "mixed assorted", I will include a vibrant mix of all or most of the colors. I'm happy to exclude certain colors, just add a note it the message to seller at checkout.

If you specify "specific", please tell me exactly which colors you would like in the message to seller. 

Color options include (as shown in 2nd photo):
1. Red
2. Orange
3. Yellow
4. Emerald Green
5. Electric Blue
6. Dark Purple
7. Hot Pink

8. White
9. Gold
10. Silver
11. Light Purple
12. Rose 
13. Lime Green
14. Sky Blue


You may also choose how many horns you would like. If you need a quantity larger than those listed, please send me a message. 



Thanks so much!
